dct_title_s: Hindoostan : with the Island of Ceylon Maldivas & c &c.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:28,000,000]."Jones & Smith sculp." Numbered 30. Shows boundaries, rivers and principal settlements. Relief shown pictorially. London meridian. Dimensions: 25 x 21 centimeters
